title: Executive Getting Started Guide to DataTools Pro
excerpt: Get started managing and analyzing your metadata with DataTools Pro
content_markdown:
Thank you for signing up for DataTools Pro! As a business leader the metrics and KPIs you use help you steer your organization. For your role we recommend getting started with our [Metrics Glossary](/metrics)

## Step 1 Connect your Salesforce Objects

If you are an executive with a knack for technology or wear many hats, we invite you to jump in and click on the **“Guided Tour”** button above for a step by step walkthrough to setup your Salesforce data dictionary.

## Resources to learn DataTools Pro and connect with our team…

To access support resources for this page or any tool, simply click on the help icon for contextual articles and videos. You can also re-launch this getting started window and re-watch the guided tour anytime!

![](https://datatoolspro.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/image-16.png)
